summary: Thirty years ago Bolshoi Orchestra conductor Andreï Filipov was fired for hiring Jewish musicians. Now a lowly janitor, an opportunity arises to gather his old musicians to go and pose as the official Buolshoi orchestra in Paris.
cast: Aleksey Guskov|Dmitriy Nazarov|Mélanie Laurent|François Berléand|Miou-Miou|Valeriy Barinov|Lionel Abelanski|Laurent Bateau|Vlad Ivanov|Anna Kamenkova|Roger Dumas|Anghel Gheorghe|Aleksandr Komissarov|Vitalie Bichir|Despina Stanescu|Guillaume Gallienne|Valentin Teodosiu|Ion Sapdaru|Maria Dinulescu|Anamaria Ferentz|Silvia Popa|Marie Rosse|Florian Budeanu|David Marcian|Marek Czerniawski|Lavrenth Nujnoi|Andrei Karassenko|Théodore Komaniecki|Bogdane Antoane|Gheorghe Frunza|Romeo Ciocarian|Ioan Gusa|Aurel Orosanu|Constantin Grigore|Valeriu Negruta|Sigismond Cachot|Egatherina Tudorache|Evguenia Fabre|Ioan Coman|Sara Martins|Patrick Zard|Mihai Calin|Tatiana Rotari|Constantin Barbulescu|Sofila Ouzahir|Bing Yin|Philippe Uchan|Hervé Pauchon|Ovidiu Cuncea|Constantin Draganescu|Sacha Vikouloff|Anton Yakovlev|Alexandru Suciu|Henri Paul|Ramzy Bedia|Eric Judor|Deszö Balogh|Catherine Bastien|Pierre Birling|Tony Bonfis|Philippe Defosse|Françoise Gernigon|Petia Iourtchenko|Bernard Lacaze-Eslous|Radu Lipoveanu|Roméo Liviu Balan|Adriana Marinca|Carmen Oprea|Igor Ramos|Romano|Mauricio Romero|Petr Ruzicka|Raimond Sandu|Emmanuelle Stanese|Lela Tsindelani|Efim Zoubriski|Vernice Klier|Dragos Onisei
title: El concierto
